reviewText: I got this as a gift for my grandson and he has really enjoyed watching it. We are looking forward for the next seasons

My son loves this cartoon, I have seasons 1, 2 and 3 on iTunes, and when I saw volume 4 on amazon, couldn't resist, bought it right that second! Well, it's not new, it comes with only five episodes that are in season 2:

Episode one SNOWDANCE
Episode two INHERITANCE
Episode three A DISTANCE SHORE
Episode four THE JOURNEY HOME
Episode five ROBOSLUGS  or MECHASLUGS

So, if you own these episodes from another source be careful, and don't waste your money!!

My son who is new to the series enjoyed watching the slug slingers shoot their tiny yet powerful slugs at relentless enemies. While the cute slugs were not able to win my daughter over, my son enjoyed them and all of the action packed into this DVD collection.  For less than $12, this DVD is worth every penny.
I just LOVE this DVD. I highly recommend this seller to anyone.
Another super SlugTerra DVD that has been watch a few times but has not gotten old.
Thank you!! My son is so happy to have his movie!
Ordered this for a friend. It works
A VERY ENTERTAINING SERIES FOR YOUNG BOYS.

Both my 2 sons and my daughter love slug terra and watch it all the time but I was disappointed that it was only 5 episodes of season 2 but if you don't have it on something else I recommend getting it because your children will love it. Hours of fun.
Great for kids ! Fast shipping too!
